snippet: Competitors at the 14th Annual International Classic Video Game Tournament at the American Classic Arcade Museum revisited the first generation of computer games.
abstract: Enthusiasts of first-generation video games gather at the American Classic Arcade Museum in Laconia, NH, for the 14th annual International Classic Video Game Tournament.
lead_paragraph: Competitors at the 14th Annual International Classic Video Game Tournament at the American Classic Arcade Museum revisited the first generation of computer games.

headline.seo: 14th Annual International Classic Video Game Tournament
